name: Elementaball
description:
Use the power of the elements to rise to the top of the world-renowned Elementaball league! Each species has their own elemental type and a wide range of moves to try to knock out opponents and score goals. The core elements of fire, water, and plants counter each other, so choose your moves wisely -- whoever knocks out the other team or scores the most points wins! 

Controller does not seem to be supported in some browsers, but give it a try! This game was designed for a gamepad.

Analog stick is too sensitive in menus! This is a Godot bug that I haven't had time to fix. D-pad works great, though.

Controls:

Kick: Space/controller X (or equivalent, these are listed in dualshock)

Pass: E/Circle

Tackle: Shift/Square

Change Player: Q/Triangle
